implementation_details.summary: Extracted duplicated milliseconds-to-timespec conversion code into static helper function
changes: Added ms_to_timespec() static helper function after refill_tokens()
Replaced duplicated conversion in Socket_simple_ratelimit_acquire() at lines 232-233
Replaced duplicated conversion in Socket_simple_ratelimit_acquire_timeout() at lines 290-291
Uses existing NANOSECONDS_PER_MILLISECOND constant instead of magic number 1000000
